The Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Washed Duck Insulated Active Jacket is a rugged and reliable choice for anyone who needs a warm and durable jacket for work or outdoor activities. Its quality construction and functional design make it a top-notch investment.  Pros:  1. Durable Material: The washed duck fabric is tough and built to withstand harsh conditions, making it ideal for outdoor work or rough environments.  2. Warm Insulation: The quilted lining provides excellent warmth without being too bulky, perfect for cold weather.  3. Comfortable Fit: The loose fit allows for easy movement and layering, making it practical for various activities.  4. Functional Design: Features a hood, rib-knit cuffs, and waistband to keep out the cold, plus deep pockets for added convenience.  5. Timeless Look: The classic Carhartt design combines functionality with a rugged style that never goes out of fashion.  Cons:  The jacket is heavy, which may not be ideal for those seeking a lightweight option.  The loose fit might feel oversized for some; consider sizing down for a more tailored look.  Overall ★★★★★ The Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Washed Duck Insulated Active Jacket is perfect for anyone who values durability, warmth, and classic style. It’s a go-to jacket for outdoor work, cold-weather adventures, or just braving winter comfortably. Highly recommended for hard workers and outdoor enthusiasts!

评论概述: Carhartt made in USA 2021 thick, Made in Indonesia 2024 thin
评论详情: I have 2 high quality (gray-gravel) medium sized  Carhartt J140 Flannel-Lined Active Jac J140 - Loose Fit - Firm Duck - 3 Warmest Rating made in USA coats purchased in 2021.  I purchased the same model number only large in black and Made in Indonesia as of Dec 2024.The contrast is the 2021 USA (gray) coat's liner feels and looks like a comforter, the 2024 outsourced black version from Indonesia is thinner and with the texture of a blanket. The 2024 version is quilted and warm, but I strongly suggest not relying upon the Indonesian (4th world) version in 32 degree or less temperatures. I went outside wearing the 2024 version in 27 degree weather for 5 minutes and felt the cold coming through the coat.The pictures are only a sample and lack detail to thoroughly show the differences between the Indonesia 2024 black model versus 2021 gray USA version. Carhartt customer service politely listened to my concerns and advised no one else had reported quality control issues with products outsourced to other countries.  However, there are many internet reviews on the new thinner inferior versions. The summary is the quality is not the same, the new thinner version may be serviceable for cooler temperatures above 32 degrees, not personally recommended for long outside work.

评论概述: Must Buy for a High Quality and Affordable Winter Jacket
评论详情: This jacket is one of my best purchases ever. I got recommended to it by my friend’s dad who had the same jacket (J-130) for over 25 years. I can tell why it held up for so long. This jacket is perfect for work in the cold or just for styling your outfits (I know you kind of people exist). The fabric this is made of is absolutely astounding and the stitching matches that as well. Along with that, there’s so many features that aren’t advertised on here like the inside zipper pockets and pen holder built into the right side hand pocket. The design of the cuffs allow for a perfect fit with any winter style/skiing glove. The part that absolutely sold me on this jacket was the zipper though. Typically Carhartt kind of misses on their zippers in my experience (especially with their backpacks and lunchboxes) but this one is very high quality. The one downside I can think of this jacket is the plastic aglets (the things on the end of the hood drawstring). Other than that, this jacket is perfect and 100% worth the $130 price tag.

I was really concerned about the sizing but XXL fits perfectly at 6'2 225 . Previous jacket was XL tall and this fits the same but better quality.  Made in Mexico but I'd take that over India 😆 Now hopefully the color doesn't fade to fast.
I had been wanting to purchase another carhartt cold weather coat. I tried it on, and it is just what I will need for cold Wisconsin Winter

The jacket is made in Nicaragua, spring 2024. The quality of the materials and tailoring is normal. The sleeves feel narrow around the elbow. My weight is 86 kg and my height is 170 cm. According to the measurement table, size L fits. I bought size M. Shoulders, chest (110 cm), waist (100 cm) - just right, you can wear a sweatshirt. But I would like the length to be 5 cm shorter. The elastic at the bottom is weak, you can't tuck the jacket at the waist. Otherwise, no complaints.
Too big

I'm 5'9" and 165 lbs, and the medium fits me perfectly. It's not too short and roomy enough to give me plenty of freedom to move around. The stitching is top-notch, and the materials are solid—warm and even somewhat water-resistant. That said, I wouldn't recommend this jacket for heavy-duty work (not sure it will last long enough).

评论概述: Carhartt is sized large. Order a size (or two) down.
评论详情: I am getting into Carhartt. Here in Montana, the weather is harsh. I am a laborer and spend a lot of time in the rough. I also do vehicle and motorcycle maintenance. Carhartt stands on business. When I tried to wear the trendy lightweight puffer jackets, I felt like a douchebag trying to make a fashion statement and fit in. What broke the camel's back is when my arms grazed against an exhaust manifold and melted the puffer jacket!! Lol. Anyways, this is tough canvas and the 3M flannel lining is very warm. I am 5ft8 and 175lbs. I ordered a medium. A large would just be too big. With a medium I could fit a sweater under it for the -30°F days. If you are my height and size and want a snug fit where it doesn't get so cold  you could probably get away with a small. The zipper is heavy duty and I'm impressed with the build quality and materials.
Bought as a Christmas present, it was much appreciated

I got this jacket in the day before the big freeze in Texas this last winter.  I was outside in 14 degree temps most of the day for 2 days and it kept me warm and dry.  Very impressed with the warmth and comfort of this jacket.  I am also a big guy. I usually wear a size 3XLT or 4XLT.  This one is a 3XLT and it fits nicely with plenty of room to layer and move around.  Great jacket from a great brand.
